translation: It's Zero! She's here!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: It's Zero! She's here!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Shit! Everybody run!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Shit! Everybody run!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Don't retreat, fool! Fight her! Fight her now!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Don't retreat, fool! Fight her! Fight her now!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Advance! Advaaance!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Advance! Advaaance!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Dammit! We can't hold her!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Dammit! We can't hold her!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: An Intoner that can summon dragons!?{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: An Intoner that can summon dragons!?{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: That flower is freaking me out, man!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: That flower is freaking me out, man!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: She's too fast for us!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: She's too fast for us!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: We're being punished! This is divine punishment!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: We're being punished! This is divine punishment!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Damn! She's mowing us down like flies!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Damn! She's mowing us down like flies!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: It's Zero! The Intoner! ...And her DRAGON!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: It's Zero! The Intoner! ...And her DRAGON!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: THAT'S Zero!?{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: THAT'S Zero!?{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Keep your eyes forward!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Keep your eyes forward!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: That...that's just...{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: That...that's just...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: We must lay down our lives to stop the accursed Intoner!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: We must lay down our lives to stop the accursed Intoner!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Yeahhh!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Yeahhh!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Ah, the pain! The paaain!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Ah, the pain! The paaain!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Someone, anyone help me!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Someone, anyone help me!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Give me a hand! He's not gonna make it!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Give me a hand! He's not gonna make it!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: It's no different over here!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: It's no different over here!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Medics! Where the hell are the medics!?{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Medics! Where the hell are the medics!?{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Help me! Please, help meeee!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Help me! Please, help meeee!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Quit your whining!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Quit your whining!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Hold nothing back! Charge! Go, go, go!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Hold nothing back! Charge! Go, go, go!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: You won't be forgiven, traitorous Intoner!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: You won't be forgiven, traitorous Intoner!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Was Zero's eye always like that!?{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Was Zero's eye always like that!?{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Don't get careless or you'll lose your head!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Don't get careless or you'll lose your head!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: April the 20th, 1000 A.D.{#Name="Accord"}
source: April the 20th, 1000 A.D.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: The Land of Seas.{#Name="Accord"}
source: The Land of Seas.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Come on, you big son of a bitch!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Come on, you big son of a bitch!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: 私と戦うなんて百年早いんでないぃいッ？{#Name="セント"}
source: 私と戦うなんて百年早いんでないぃいッ？{#Name="セント"}

translation: ここで一汗流した後はゼロ様と……ふほほほっ{#Name="オクタ"}
source: ここで一汗流した後はゼロ様と……ふほほほっ{#Name="オクタ"}

translation: 寄るなよ！　死ねッ！　死ねッ！{LF}醜いヤツは大嫌いだッ！{#Name="ディト"}
source: 寄るなよ！　死ねッ！　死ねッ！{LF}醜いヤツは大嫌いだッ！{#Name="ディト"}

translation: この……苦しみも……痛みも……私の望みッ{#Name="デカート"}
source: この……苦しみも……痛みも……私の望みッ{#Name="デカート"}

translation: Ah, the sea is certainly lovely, isn't it?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Ah, the sea is certainly lovely, isn't it?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Indeed!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Indeed!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Seriously? You guys are crazy.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Seriously? You guys are crazy.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: It's just a big blue blob.{LF}And it smells like fish shit.{#Name="Dito"}
source: It's just a big blue blob.{LF}And it smells like fish shit.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Seriously? You guys are crazy.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Seriously? You guys are crazy.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: It's just a big blue blob.{LF}And it smells like fish shit.{#Name="Dito"}
source: It's just a big blue blob.{LF}And it smells like fish shit.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I'll go attack the ships!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I'll go attack the ships!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Hey, get your shit together!{LF}We're taking fire here!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hey, get your shit together!{LF}We're taking fire here!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'm trying, I'm trying!{LF}I'm trying really, really hard!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I'm trying, I'm trying!{LF}I'm trying really, really hard!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: 145{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 145{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Um, Zero?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Um, Zero?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: What now?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What now?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Can I go find a bush? I need to pee.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Can I go find a bush? I need to pee.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Just hold it, dummy! Or else piss from up there.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Just hold it, dummy! Or else piss from up there.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: What!? I can't do that!{LF}That's what animals do and stuff!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: What!? I can't do that!{LF}That's what animals do and stuff!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Woo-hoo! I sunk that ship!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Woo-hoo! I sunk that ship!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Great.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Great.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hey, I did it all by myself! C'mon, Zero,{LF}you can praise me a little!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hey, I did it all by myself! C'mon, Zero,{LF}you can praise me a little!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Maybe next time...IF you don't piss yourself.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Maybe next time...IF you don't piss yourself.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yay!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Yay!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: An ambush, huh?{#Name="Zero"}
source: An ambush, huh?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh ho! This is a wretched homecoming indeed!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho! This is a wretched homecoming indeed!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: You know we're going through all{LF}this crap for you, Zero, right?{#Name="Dito"}
source: You know we're going through all{LF}this crap for you, Zero, right?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: ...Riiight!?{#Name="Dito"}
source: ...Riiight!?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: What are you going on about?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What are you going on about?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Goodness, Lady Zero! You certainly{LF}can be dense sometimes!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Goodness, Lady Zero! You certainly{LF}can be dense sometimes!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: It's hardly befitting your grand{LF}status as an Intoner.{#Name="Cent"}
source: It's hardly befitting your grand{LF}status as an Intoner.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Look, all I'm saying is, a little thank-you{LF}might be nice.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Look, all I'm saying is, a little thank-you{LF}might be nice.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Not that we'd ask for money or anything{LF}so crass from an Intoner!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Not that we'd ask for money or anything{LF}so crass from an Intoner!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Let's see... I know! How about{LF}a nice, home-cooked meal?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Let's see... I know! How about{LF}a nice, home-cooked meal?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Ah, how lovely!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Ah, how lovely!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Great. It's settled, then.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Great. It's settled, then.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Zero's home-cooked food... What an honor!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Zero's home-cooked food... What an honor!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I didn't agree to that.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I didn't agree to that.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Whatcha gonna make, Z? I could go for stew.{LF}Or anything boiled, really.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Whatcha gonna make, Z? I could go for stew.{LF}Or anything boiled, really.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I prefer organic dishes with locally{LF}sourced ingredients.{#Name="Cent"}
source: I prefer organic dishes with locally{LF}sourced ingredients.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I'm rather fond of sweets.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I'm rather fond of sweets.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I'll take anything that doubles as an aphrodisiac!{#Name="Octa"}
source: I'll take anything that doubles as an aphrodisiac!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: That sounds like the last thing YOU need.{#Name="Zero"}
source: That sounds like the last thing YOU need.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So, back to what we were discussing earlier...{#Name="Dito"}
source: So, back to what we were discussing earlier...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I actually think stew is my favorite meal. {#Name="Dito"}
source: I actually think stew is my favorite meal. {#Name="Dito"}

translation: Yes, though a nice piece of fish carpaccio{LF}would be lovely.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Yes, though a nice piece of fish carpaccio{LF}would be lovely.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Maybe with some tapenade on the side{LF}and a chilled Chablis?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Maybe with some tapenade on the side{LF}and a chilled Chablis?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Or you can just soak bread in eggs and sugar.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Or you can just soak bread in eggs and sugar.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Cook it up, add honey and cream?{LF}...Delicious!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Cook it up, add honey and cream?{LF}...Delicious!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I've heard that soup made from the fresh blood{LF}of a rare beast will raise one's spirits all night!{#Name="Octa"}
source: I've heard that soup made from the fresh blood{LF}of a rare beast will raise one's spirits all night!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I'll just have what you always give me, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I'll just have what you always give me, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Hey, yeah. What does she feed you anyway?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hey, yeah. What does she feed you anyway?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Um, let's see... Rare meat cut into chunks...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Um, let's see... Rare meat cut into chunks...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Overcooked soup that tastes like metal...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Overcooked soup that tastes like metal...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: A bunch of moldy, bitter leaves...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: A bunch of moldy, bitter leaves...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: This fatty blob I can chew and{LF}chew and it won't go away...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: This fatty blob I can chew and{LF}chew and it won't go away...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Stop! Just stop! I'm about to hurl over here.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Stop! Just stop! I'm about to hurl over here.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Is that the sort of thing a dragon usually eats?{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Is that the sort of thing a dragon usually eats?{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: No, but that's what Zero eats,{LF}so I just go along with it.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: No, but that's what Zero eats,{LF}so I just go along with it.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: You guys want some?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You guys want some?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: No thanks!{#Name="Dito/Cent/Octa/Decadus"}
source: No thanks!{#Name="Dito/Cent/Octa/Decadus"}

translation: You guys stay here. I need to go look for something.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You guys stay here. I need to go look for something.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Accord... What did I tell you about barging in here!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Accord... What did I tell you about barging in here!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Huh? I could have sworn I knocked...{#Name="Accord"}
source: Huh? I could have sworn I knocked...{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Oh well! Water under the bridge.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Oh well! Water under the bridge.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Lemme guess. You're here to give me some grim warning?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Lemme guess. You're here to give me some grim warning?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yep!{#Name="Accord"}
source: Yep!{#Name="Accord"}

translation: As things stand now, it doesn't matter what{LF}branch you go down—it all ends in disaster.{#Name="Accord"}
source: As things stand now, it doesn't matter what{LF}branch you go down—it all ends in disaster.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Figured I'd give you a heads-up.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Figured I'd give you a heads-up.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: So how come you can see the future, huh?{#Name="Zero"}
source: So how come you can see the future, huh?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I can't tell you that.{#Name="Accord"}
source: I can't tell you that.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Or maybe...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Or maybe...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hmm?{#Name="Accord"}
source: Hmm?{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Maybe you don't see the future at all.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Maybe you don't see the future at all.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Maybe you're the one who's making it. That would explain a lot.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Maybe you're the one who's making it. That would explain a lot.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Sorry, but I'm not that talented.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Sorry, but I'm not that talented.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: ...I see.{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...I see.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ooh, scary.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Ooh, scary.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Well, until next time.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Well, until next time.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Hmph.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hmph.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Gigas!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Gigas!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Cannoneers!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Cannoneers!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Return to Zero's cottage.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Return to Zero's cottage.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: So if Accord's telling the truth about this "branch" stuff...{#Name="Zero"}
source: So if Accord's telling the truth about this "branch" stuff...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Maybe there's a world where the flower doesn't appear.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Maybe there's a world where the flower doesn't appear.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: There's gotta be a hint or something that can lead me there...{#Name="Zero"}
source: There's gotta be a hint or something that can lead me there...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The arm I lost to One...{#Name="Zero"}
source: The arm I lost to One...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: If that's when the branch occurred, I'm already too late.{#Name="Zero"}
source: If that's when the branch occurred, I'm already too late.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: 181{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 181{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Could there really be a world without this flower?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Could there really be a world without this flower?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I wonder what I'm like over there? Or what my sisters are like.{LF}...Do I even HAVE sisters?{#Name="Zero"}
source: I wonder what I'm like over there? Or what my sisters are like.{LF}...Do I even HAVE sisters?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Meh, no point dwelling on it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Meh, no point dwelling on it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: 127{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 127{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Medicine...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Medicine...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I managed to survive, but at what cost?{#Name="Zero"}
source: I managed to survive, but at what cost?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: My body is cursed now, and the stupid thing{LF}won't even let me die.{#Name="Zero"}
source: My body is cursed now, and the stupid thing{LF}won't even let me die.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: All those guys who call me the accursed Intoner{LF}are more right then they know.{#Name="Zero"}
source: All those guys who call me the accursed Intoner{LF}are more right then they know.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: 217{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 217{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: If I'm the singularity Accord was talking about,{#Name="Zero"}
source: If I'm the singularity Accord was talking about,{#Name="Zero"}

translation: then maybe I'm the one bringing this world to ruin.{#Name="Zero"}
source: then maybe I'm the one bringing this world to ruin.{#Name="Zero"}

source: 163{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: I think it's time to talk to Accord face-to-face.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I think it's time to talk to Accord face-to-face.{#Name="Zero"}

source: This land fell into chaos after Lady Five's death.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Still, I'm surprised to see so much resistance.{#Name="Decadus"}

source: I think it's time to talk to Accord face-to-face.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Sooo...if this is the end of this branch, then... Wait, what?{#Name="アコール"}
source: Sooo...if this is the end of this branch, then... Wait, what?{#Name="アコール"}

translation: Oh, gosh, I didn't lose a recording by accident, did I?{#Name="アコール"}
source: Oh, gosh, I didn't lose a recording by accident, did I?{#Name="アコール"}

translation: And what happened to the branches between A and C?{#Name="アコール"}
source: And what happened to the branches between A and C?{#Name="アコール"}

translation: Ugh. If I screw this up, I'm gonna be in soooo much trouble...{#Name="アコール"}
source: Ugh. If I screw this up, I'm gonna be in soooo much trouble...{#Name="アコール"}
